title: Document public API of lxcore.sys, add support in WDK

comments.body: It is now 2019 and we still have not heard anything about this. I would have hoped that some of the interfaces would have stabilized enough by now to be made public.
Windows is not Linux. Want Linux? Use Linux.
Would be cool, but I'm fine with waiting until WSL is more mature, so that further progress isn't hindered by a fixed ABI (as has been the case with Windows for 30 years now :)
